schema.title: Crowdfund

items.description: A struct describing a token module, provided with the instantiation message this struct is used to record the info about the module and how/if it should be instantiated

address.description:
An address that can be used within the Andromeda ecosystem. Inspired by the cosmwasm-std `Addr` type. https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/2a1c698520a1aacedfe3f4803b0d7d653892217a/packages/std/src/addresses.rs#L33

This address can be one of two things: 1. A valid human readable address e.g. `cosmos1...` 2. A valid Andromeda VFS path e.g. `/home/user/app/component`

VFS paths can be local in the case of an app and can be done by referencing `./component` they can also contain protocols for cross chain communication. A VFS path is usually structured as so:

`<protocol>://<chain (required if ibc used)>/<path>` or `ibc://cosmoshub-4/user/app/component`

token_address.description:
An address that can be used within the Andromeda ecosystem. Inspired by the cosmwasm-std `Addr` type. https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/2a1c698520a1aacedfe3f4803b0d7d653892217a/packages/std/src/addresses.rs#L33

This address can be one of two things: 1. A valid human readable address e.g. `cosmos1...` 2. A valid Andromeda VFS path e.g. `/home/user/app/component`

VFS paths can be local in the case of an app and can be done by referencing `./component` they can also contain protocols for cross chain communication. A VFS path is usually structured as so:

`<protocol>://<chain (required if ibc used)>/<path>` or `ibc://cosmoshub-4/user/app/component`
token_address.title: Token address

schema.description: An ADO to allow the creation of a crowdfund for a token and can include minting.

ui:options.title: Mint after sale allowed?
ui:options.description: A flag to whether minting is allowed after a sale has been done. Minting is never allowed during a sale.

ui:options.title: Additional ADO's
ui:options.description: An optional vector of Andromeda Modules that can be attached to the contract. "rates", "address-list", and "receipt" modules can be added.

ui:options.title: Identifier
ui:options.description: Can be either an address or app component name of a specific ADO within an app

ui:options.title: Module Type
ui:options.description: The name of the module to add. Can be set one of the following: "rates", "address-list", and "receipt".

ui:options.title: Is Module Able to be Modified?
ui:options.description: Whether the module can be later modified or not.

ui:options.title: Token Address
ui:options.description: The contract address of the token.

ui:options.title: Identifier
ui:options.help: Can be either an address or app component name of a specific ADO within an app
